scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function rmDir(dir) { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(file => { const curPath = path.join(dir, file); if (fs.lstatSync(curPath).isDirectory()) rmDir(curPath); else fs.unlinkSync(curPath); }); fs.rmdirSync(dir); } } rmDir('dist'); rmDir('node_modules/.vite');"
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
